data.marketing-pricing-title: 가격 — 앤카즈 수수료 및 가격 플렌 | andCards Suite
data.marketing-pricing-description: andCards 가격, 수수료, 데모 시험 버전, 코워킹 스페이스 소프트웨어 가격, 코워킹 앱 가격
data.marketing-pricing-headline: Get your own coworking space app
data.marketing-pricing-notice-room-booking: All prices are indicative and subject to applicable taxes in your country and payment method fees. At the moment, we offer services in South Korea only. If you live in another country, please contact us for a price estimate.
data.marketing-pricing-notice-payment-system: All prices are per meeting room per month before tax. If you can't see your country in the list, please contact us and we'll provide a rate.
data.marketing-pricing-payment-system-for-cow: Payment system for coworking membership plans
data.marketing-pricing-payment-system-externa: External room booking system through andCards Spaces
data.marketing-pricing-request-demo-text: 2주 무료 시험버전을 이용해보세요, 신용카드는 필요하지 않습니다! 🎁
data.marketing-pricing-subheadline: 코워킹 스페이스를 위한 소프트웨어 : 멤버쉽 장기 결제, 회의실 예약 시스템
